contentrichtext.text: '''Ashlesha''' is the 9th [[Nakshatra]] among the 27 Nakshatras in [[Hindu astrology]]. Ashlesha is also known as the '''Clinging Star''' or [[Nāga]].<ref>http://astrobix.com/astroblog/post/ashlesha-nakshatra-chacertistics-ashlesha-nakshatra-career.aspx</ref> It is known as [[Lernaean Hydra|Hydra]]. It extends from 16:40 to 30:00 [[Cancer (constellation)|Cancri]].<ref>http://www.astrojyoti.com/ashlesha.htm</ref> The planetary lord is [[Mercury (astrology)|Mercury]] or [[Budha]]. It's presiding deity are the [[Nāga]]s.<ref>http://www.funonthenet.in/forums/index.php?topic=172912.0</ref> The nakshatra symbol is a coiled serpent. It is a ''Trikshna'' or Sharp nakshatra. It's animal symbol is the male cat.<ref>http://www.selfrealisation.net/UK/VedicAstrology/ashlesha.htm</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{HinduMythology}} {{Hindu astrology}} [[Category:Nakshatra]] [[Category:Hindu astrology]] {{Hindu-myth-stub}}
